selections.name: Animal
selections.reason: Consistent performer who has finished runner-up in last two starts at this track. Maps well and brings the strongest form lines into this maiden.

selections.name: Vieux Riche
selections.reason: Ran well on debut finishing 3rd. Drawn perfectly in barrier 3 to get a soft run and should improve with race experience.

selections.name: Lisa Lass
selections.reason: Coming off a solid 2nd placing. Draws well and fits the profile of a contender in this field.

selections.name: Costa Paros
selections.reason: Showed improvement last preparation. Fresh here and could run a race at odds.

danger_horse.name: Vieux Riche
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced improver from a good stable who could challenge the favorite if they take a step forward.

selections.name: Ironic Fortune
selections.reason: Ran boldly on debut at Seymour to finish 2nd. Drawn ideally in barrier 2 to be right on the speed. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Frosted Miss
selections.reason: Solid debut performance finishing 2nd at Yarra Valley. Will take benefit from that run and maps well.

selections.name: Full Of Knowledge
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 2nd last start. Drawn the rails and should be competitive.

selections.name: Fly By Light
selections.reason: First starter from the McDonald yard. Watch betting moves closely.

danger_horse.name: Frosted Miss
danger_horse.reason: Showed enough on debut to suggest she can win this with natural improvement.

selections.name: Exit
selections.reason: Class runner resuming. Won first-up last campaign at Sandown. Trialled well and looks superior to this field.

selections.name: Gliding Lightening
selections.reason: Winner last start at this track. In good form and must be respected despite the wider draw.

selections.name: Sheanadh
selections.reason: Won well on debut. Promising type from the Walker yard who can take the next step.

selections.name: Toronado Queen
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed talent in debut campaign. Watch for a forward showing fresh.

danger_horse.name: Gliding Lightening
danger_horse.reason: Proven winner at the track and distance recently.

selections.name: Warchime
selections.reason: Last start winner who stays in a similar grade. Maps to get a good run and is in peak form.

selections.name: Powerful Torque
selections.reason: Dominant winner last start. Up in weight but retains form. Solid contender.

selections.name: Convo
selections.reason: Consistent type who has placed in 3 of last 4. Will be running on.

selections.name: Motiver
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last start. Competitive in this grade.

danger_horse.name: Powerful Torque
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is hard to ignore and looks the main threat to the top pick.

selections.name: Tookay Pete
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick of wins. In career best form and loves this distance range.

selections.name: Commands Success
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Drawn the inside and will be hard to hold out late.

selections.name: Fully Calculated
selections.reason: Consistent mare who rarely runs a bad race. Placed last start and maps well.

selections.name: Educated
selections.reason: Resuming. Won on debut. Could be anything and drawn softly.

danger_horse.name: Commands Success
danger_horse.reason: Honest performer who gets the gun run from barrier 1.

selections.name: Mystic Reign
selections.reason: Resuming. Very fast horse suited to the 955m scamper. Has won 3 from 6.

selections.name: Jennyanydots
selections.reason: Resuming. Has class on her side and draws well. Good fresh record.

selections.name: Honor Galore
selections.reason: Resuming. Track specialist who has won here before. Drawn the pole.

selections.name: Pure Bliss
selections.reason: Consistent mare resuming. Has a good winning strike rate.

danger_horse.name: Jennyanydots
danger_horse.reason: Class runner of the field who can sprint well fresh.

selections.name: Mr Assertive
selections.reason: Last start winner at Geelong. Drawn perfectly in barrier 4 to control the race or sit just off the pace.

selections.name: Rich Lover
selections.reason: Also a last start winner. Drawn inside and will be competitive again.

selections.name: Escarpa
selections.reason: Consistent type who placed last start. From barrier 1 gets a soft run.

selections.name: Bold Response
selections.reason: Placed last start. Has ability but drawn a bit wide.

danger_horse.name: Rich Lover
danger_horse.reason: In winning form and drawn to get every chance.

selections.name: Valedictorian
selections.reason: Broke through for a win last start. Confidence is up and rates highly despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Moral Turpitude
selections.reason: Last start winner who is improving. Barrier 13 is the concern but has the ability to overcome it.

selections.name: Late Harvest
selections.reason: Consistent placer. Drawn well and should be in the finish.

selections.name: Time Allowed
selections.reason: Import making local debut. Watch market for a guide.

danger_horse.name: Moral Turpitude
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is good form, just needs luck from the gate.
